item.title: Year progress in class 2020
item.description: Week General topic Topics Activities Extras 1 Introduction to psychology Introduction What is psychology 2 Introduction to psychological science Theory vs hypothesis and the process of science Forer effect, aka. blind reading , Science or pseudoscience , What is science? , Psychological mythbusters 3 Introduction to research Methods of psychological research , Zodiac signs and personality 4 Debunking myths presentations Psychological mythbusters 5 How to do research Research design Evaluating research 6 Sampling methods Sampling methods Sampling poker chips Qualitative research introduction 8 Ethics Ethics in psychological research IRB Review Qualitative research continuation 9 Research finishing Research test, Paper 3 Better describe the first paper 10 Intro to biology .
